title: nf-core/scdownstream pipeline - params.input schema
description: Schema for the file provided with params.input

sample.errorMessage: Sample name must be provided and cannot contain spaces

file.errorMessage: Input file must be a .h5ad, .h5, .rds or .csv or file.

raw.errorMessage: Input file must be a .h5ad, .h5, .rds or .csv or file.

batch_col.errorMessage: Batch column needs to start with a letter and can contain letters, numbers, underlines and dashes.

label_col.errorMessage: Label column needs to start with a letter and can contain letters, numbers, underlines and dashes.

unknown_label.errorMessage: Unknown label needs to start with a letter and can contain letters, numbers, underlines and dashes.

min_genes.errorMessage: Minimum number of genes must be an integer greater than 0.

min_cells.errorMessage: Minimum number of cells must be an integer greater than 0.

min_counts_cell.errorMessage: Minimum number of counts per cell must be an integer greater than 0.

min_counts_gene.errorMessage: Minimum number of counts per gene must be an integer greater than 0.
